question: Question_B_05_(c)
statement:
We are given the following transition matrix for a random walk

\[P = \begin{bmatrix} 0 & 1/2 \\ 1 & 1/2 \end{bmatrix}\]

Find $\lim_{n \to \infty}P^{n}\begin{bmatrix}1 \\ 0 \end{bmatrix}$
hints:
This is a generalization of
\href{Science:Math_Exam_Resources/Courses/MATH152/April_2013/Question_B_05_(b)}{part
(b)}. Change 20 to \emph{n} everywhere in
\href{Science:Math_Exam_Resources/Courses/MATH152/April_2013/Question_B_05_(b)}{part
(b)}.
